page.title: 07Area Administration W.Ho!
page.content: Devon County Council.Torridge District Council. Northam Town Council. West Devon and Torridge Constituancy. Present M.P. is Conservative. Nearest Police station is 3 miles away in Bideford. This station is not manned at night.All calls are directed to Barnstaple Police station. Vandalism is on the increase especially in summer months. Neither school nor college. Primary children attend Northam schools and Secondary go to Bideford.N. Devon College at Barnstaple. Public school children go to Bideford. Girls go to Edgehill College or the Stella Maris Convent. Boys to Grenville College.In Westwward Ho! there is a residential school for Autistic children known as Broomhayes. Several Adventure schools.
